      • saveNewConfiguration

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> saveNewConfiguration​(java.util.List<AntiPattern> antiPatterns,
                                                             java.lang.String configurationName,
                                                             java.lang.String[] antiPatternNames,
                                                             java.lang.String[] thresholdNames,
                                                             java.lang.String[] thresholdValues,
                                                             boolean fullNewConfiguration)
        Method that saves new configuration from given parameters to the map structure
        Parameters:
        antiPatterns - List of anti-pattern objects
        configurationName - New configuration name
        antiPatternNames - Array of anti-pattern names
        thresholdNames - Array of threshold names
        thresholdValues - Array pf threshold values
        fullNewConfiguration - True, if the whole new configuration is created and False, if only some thresholds are updated
        Returns:
        List of the incorrectly set parameters
